biblio-self-driving-cars

2D/ 3D object detection, segmentation, depth estimation for self-driving car

View the Project on GitHub maiminh1996/biblio-self-driving-cars

Depth Estimation/ Datasets

How to obtain depth ground truth:

Ref Highlight description  
KITTI (stereo)
CVPR 12 IJRR 13		 ● Stereo (1224×368) + LiDAR 64 beams
● Gth: projected LiDAR 64 beams pose for 11 odometry sequences
● the 200 training images of KITTI stereo 2015 overlap with the validation images of KITTI OD
Scene Flow
CVPR 16		 ● Stereo (960x540)
● Synthetic dataset: 35454 training & 4370 testing images
● Gth: dense and elaborate disparity maps
Cityscapes
CVPR 16		 ● Stereo (1024×2048)
● Gth: 22,973 stereo image pairs training
● Real dataset: 50 cities forseveral months
● 5000 images with fine annotations and 20000 images with coarse annotations

This project is maintained by maiminh1996
